full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify: Design, Fabrication, and Installation of Skeleton Radar Tower
=====================================

## Contract Details

* Contract Title: Invitation to Qualify - Design, Fabrication, and Installation of Skeleton Radar Tower
* Contract Reference Number: WS4378269217
* Tender Closing Date: January 18, 2024, 14:00:00

## Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Design, Fabrication, and Installation of a skeleton radar tower at Cape Bonavista, Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Scope of Work

* Design and engineering of a 12.2m square self-support tower structure
* Fabrication of the tower structure and installation at Cape Bonavista, NL
* Foundation repairs and lightning protection

## Evaluation Criteria

* The work will be awarded to the contractor submitting the lowest price proposal that meets the required specifications.

## Contract Requirements

* The successful contractor must complete the work within 12 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
* The contractor is responsible for obtaining all necessary permits and approvals.

## Contact Information

* Name: Edward Johnston, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18416794?extsite=MTg0MTY3OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Notes

* This is an electronic tendering opportunity and all documents can be accessed through the provided URL.
* Proposals submitted after the closing date and time will not be considered.
* The successful contractor will be required to provide proof of liability insurance and workers' compensation coverage.
